title: Kylie Jenner does make-up in just 10 minutes and still manages to look amazing
text:
Kylie does her make-up in just ten minutes now… (Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic)

Kylie Jenner only has ‘10 minutes’ to do her make-up now she’s a mother to 1-year-old daughter Stormi.

The beauty star explained in a new YouTube video how she used to take her time doing her make-up routine, but since having her daughter Stormi with her ex-partner Travis Scott, she has to speed up her routine and has got the whole thing into a pretty impressive ten minutes.

She said: ‘I’ve had to cut my routine down a lot. This routine really takes me no longer than like 10 minutes.’

The 22-year-old businesswoman likes to savour the moment because she finds doing her make-up really ‘therapeutic’ and enjoys doing her make-up while listening to music and drinking wine or coffee.

She revealed: ‘My favourite part about doing my make-up is, it’s like a therapeutic moment for me.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I turn my music on, if I’m gonna get ready at night I’ll have a glass of wine. Or, I’ll have my coffee if I’m doing it in the morning.’

It seems as if Kylie’s love for make-up has already inspired daughter Stormi, as the little one is already ‘super into’ cosmetics.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star said: ‘Stormi is actually super into make-up right now. It is amazing. Every time I’m wearing lipstick she notices and she looks at me like: “Lip! Lip! Lip!”’

But Ky – who launched her own make-up brand Kylie Cosmetics back in 2015 – doesn’t know if she’s going to let Stormi wear products on her face yet.

She added: ‘I haven’t even thought about when I’m going to let Stormi wear make-up. I’m going to see, she might not even want to wear make-up. But honestly, with the way things are going though, this girl is obsessed with make-up.’

description: Kylie Jenner says she now only has ‘10 minutes’ to do her make-up now she's a mother to 1-year-old daughter Stormi.
